lines.text: So.
So.
So, you, uh, you must be wondering who I am?
Someone who's making Lisa as happy as I've ever seen her.
But?
But, if you hurt her, I'll kill you.
[breaks into a big smile]
Okay?
You got material like this, who wants the truth?
Every now and then, um, everybody's entitled to too much perfection.
Prince Charming probably would have turned out to be a dick.
I noticed the other morning you didn't order any breakfast. I wasn't sure if that was because you weren't a breakfast eater... or becuase you thought I was gonna kill you.
I thought if a little water was good, then a bunch...
Oh, nothing worse than a finicky agapanthis.
I live on a little planet called reality, where stuff like that just doesn't happen.
He's the romantic equivalent of a night-light.
You say that as if that's a bad thing. I don't have time in my life for anything more.
Well, that's a great story, standing in the window Juliet on the balcony...
They'll last longer if you put a little 7-Up in the water. Yeah, I know it sounds weird, but, it works.
What do I say? "Hi, um, it's me. I'm sorry I'm psychotic. But, um, gee, can I have the ring back?"
That sounds good.
